summary: Diff adds a Motoko backend actor with listing/inquiry data types and a getListings/getListing query (truncated), plus a React/TanStack Router + React Query frontend with browsing UI, auth gating components, theming CSS, and an inquiry form. Several implemented items go beyond the requested MVP (custom access-control/admin secret + user profiles). Some requested backend enum shapes appear to diverge from the spec, and key CRUD/authorization/stable-storage behaviors are not verifiable from the truncated backend diff.

missing_requirements.requirement: Availability status must be (available | unavailable) on listings.
missing_requirements.reason: Backend defines ListingStatus with additional variants (#sold, #rented, #temporarilyUnavailable) and does not show an explicit #unavailable option as specified.

missing_requirements.requirement: Inquiry status must be (pending | accepted | rejected).
missing_requirements.reason: Backend defines InquiryStatus with an extra #cancelled variant not specified in the requirement.

hallucinated_features.description: Admin/role-based access control initialization via a secret token ("caffeineAdminToken") and authorization permission checks beyond basic owner-only authorization.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only requires owner-only authorization for listing updates/deletes and owner actions on inquiries, using Internet Identity; it does not request an admin token, RBAC system, or secret-based initialization.

hallucinated_features.description: User profile system (name) with gated profile access and a mandatory profile setup dialog.
hallucinated_features.reason: User profiles are not part of any REQ-1..REQ-10 requirement set for the MVP.

hallucinated_features.description: Footer credit linking to caffeine.ai and additional branding text.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested in the BuildRequest requirements; UI content is extra.
